titles.title: Term Limits bill
A joint resolution proposing a constitutional amendment to limit congressional terms.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S621)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no person shall be elected to the Senate for more than two full terms and that no person shall be elected to the House for more than six full terms. Prohibits Senators from serving for more than 14 years and Representatives for more than 13 years.
